entry.title: üéâ Welcome to subscribe to App Store Discounts
entry.summary: Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!
entry.content:
Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!

About our RSS feed

  • Focused on delivering App Store app discount information
  • Whenever an app's price drops or in-app purchases go on sale, we will promptly send you a notification
  • Each app's discount information is presented in a separate feed
  • The RSS feed is completely open-source, allowing you to view, contribute, and add your favorite apps at any time

Find Us

App Store Discounts

Finally

If this project has been helpful to you, would you kindly give us a ‚≠êÔ∏è

entry.title: Husha - Echoheart Chat
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$0.29 ‚Üí Free Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºöFree

In-App Purchases

  • HushaCoin-8Ôºö$64.99
  • HushaCoin-5Ôºö$14.99
  • HushaCoin-9Ôºö$99.99
  • HushaCoin-7Ôºö$49.99
  • HushaCoin-1Ôºö$0.99
  • HushaCoin-4Ôºö$9.99
  • HushaCoin-6Ôºö$19.99
  • HushaCoin-2Ôºö$1.99
  • HushaCoin-3Ôºö$4.99

Application Description

Husha ‚Äì Your Safe Haven for Emotions Overview: Husha is an emotional support app that blends AI with voice communication to provide a safe and private space for self-expression. Through intelligent emotion recognition and an anonymous community, every voice is gently heard, and every story receives a warm response. Core Features: ‚Ä¢ Emotional Resonance Channel Discover voice posts that match your current mood through intelligent recommendations. Feel the resonance in shared emotions and realize you are never truly alone. ‚Ä¢ Anonymous Voice Treehole A fully anonymous voice-sharing space. No need for carefully chosen words‚Äîjust express your true feelings with your voice and receive warmth and support from the community. ‚Ä¢ Intelligent Listening Companions Multiple AI companions with unique personalities are available 24/7. Whether you need comfort, advice, or simply someone to talk to, there‚Äôs always an AI that understands you. ‚Ä¢ Emotional Call Connection Connect with kind listeners through intelligent matching. Share your feelings in real-time voice calls in a safe environment and receive instant emotional support.

entry.title: EvoCreo2: Monster Trainer Game
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$4.99 ‚Üí $0.99 [$0.99 ~ $4.99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö$0.99

In-App Purchases

  • Prime Gemma 1200Ôºö$9.99
  • Master PackageÔºö$19.99
  • Prime gemma 100Ôºö$0.99
  • Tamer KitÔºö$0.99
  • Starter PackageÔºö$2.99
  • Prime Gemma 2500Ôºö$19.99
  • Prime Gemma 500Ôºö$4.99
  • Evoker KitÔºö$0.99
  • Hunter PackageÔºö$9.99
  • Evoker PackageÔºö$9.99

Application Description

Join millions of players in this pocket monster game sequel Embark on an epic adventure in EvoCreo 2, the ultimate monster-catching RPG set in the captivating world of Shoru. Immerse yourself in a land teeming with mythical creatures called Creo. For thousands of years, these collectible monsters have roamed the lands, their origins and evolution shrouded in mystery. Do you have what it takes to unravel the secrets of the Creo and become a legendary Evoking Master Trainer? Uncover a Compelling Adventure Game Begin your role playing game (RPG) journey as a new recruit in the Shoru Police Academy. Creo Monsters are disappearing, and it's your mission to uncover the truth behind these mysterious events. But there's more to the story than meets the eye in this monster game ‚Äî dark plots are brewing, and your skills will be put to the test. Along the way, assist the citizens of Shoru by completing over 50 engaging missions, building alliances, and discovering hidden treasures. Capture and Train Over 300 Monsters Love monster-collecting games? Build your RPG dream team of Creo in this open-world role playing game. Hunt rare and legendary monsters, each available in unique alternate colors. With over 300 unique monsters to capture, evolve, and train, you‚Äôll have endless possibilities to customize your strategy in pocket monster games. Create powerful combinations and lead your Creo to victory in thrilling turn-based battles. Explore this monster adventure game Experience more than 30 hours of offline and online rpg gameplay as you dive into a richly detailed open world. From dense forests to mysterious caves and bustling towns, the continent of Shoru is filled with secrets waiting to be uncovered. Adventure through diverse environments, complete challenging quests, and uncover hidden paths to legendary treasures. Explore 2 more biomes in this sequel like the desert and find many monsters on the way of your adventure. Master a deep and strategic RPG battle system as a monster trainer & hunter Prepare for trainer battles with a highly customizable system. Equip your Creo with items and unlock over 100 unique traits to enhance their abilities. Train your Creo to learn and master over 200 moves, which you can swap anytime to adapt to new challenges. Face fierce opponents, manage elemental weaknesses, and use your tactical skills to gain the upper hand. Can you become a pocket monster master trainer? Prove Yourself as the Ultimate Master Trainer Challenge the strongest monster trainers across Shoru and rise through the ranks in this paid role playing game. Compete in the prestigious Coliseum, where only the best monster trainers are crowned as champions. Will you conquer every rpg battle and claim the title of Evoking Master Trainer? Key Features: - Sequel of one of the top paid role playing games worldwide - 300+ collectible monsters to capture, train, and evolve. - No level cap on your monsters - engaging endgame! - A sprawling open world with 30+ hours of offline & online gameplay. - Engaging turn-based battles with deep strategy elements. - Hundreds of moves and traits to customize your Creo. - Over 50 missions packed with adventure and rewards. - Offline play‚Äîno internet required to enjoy the game. - Stunning pixel art visuals reminiscent of classic monster RPGs. Why Players Love EvoCreo 2: Fans of Monster-Catching games and monster trainer RPGs will feel right at home. A perfect mix of creature collection, exploration, and battle strategy. Casual and hardcore gamers alike will enjoy the mix of action and adventure. Join the adventure today and start your journey toward becoming the ultimate monster trainer in EvoCreo 2! Can you catch them all and master the secrets of the Creo?

entry.title: Vault of the Void
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • The WeaverÔºö$3.99 ‚Üí $2.99 [$2.99 ~ $3.99]

All Price Information

PriceÔºö$6.99

In-App Purchases

  • Developer Supporter PackÔºö$2.99
  • The WeaverÔºö$2.99

Application Description

Craft and plan your strategy with Vault of the Void's dynamic deckbuilding! PC/Mobile Cross Save live now! Vault of the Void is a single-player, low-RNG roguelike deckbuilder designed to put the power into your hands. Continuously build, transform and iterate on your deck as you progress through your run - or even before each battle, with a fixed deck size of 20 cards required before each fight. Preview which enemies you‚Äôll be battling before each encounter, giving you a chance to carefully plan your strategy. With no random events, your success is in your hands - and your creativity and skill define your chances of victory! FEATURES - Choose from 4 different classes, each one with a completely different playstyle! - Constantly iterate on your deck with 440+ different cards! - Battle 90+ fearsome monsters as you make your way to The Void. - Change up your playstyle with 320+ Artifacts. - Infuse your cards with different Void Stones - leading to endless combinations! - PC/Mobile Crossplay: pick up where you left off at any time! - A roguelike CCG where the power‚Äôs in your hands, and without RNG.

Discount Information

All Price Information

PriceÔºöFree

  • ÊúàÂ∫¶‰ºöÂëòÔºö$0.99
  • Âπ¥Â∫¶‰ºöÂëòÂçáÁ∫ßÁªàË∫´‰ºöÂëòÔºö$9.99
  • Âπ¥Â∫¶‰ºöÂëòÔºö$3.99

Application Description

Walden is an App focused on personal management, carefully designed to bring users only a quality experience, hope you like it. Function Introduction To-Do List Integrate the four quadrants of work, according to the priority of the task rational scheduling. Support repeat schedule and reminders. Pomodoro Walden's built-in tomato clock is designed strictly according to the tomato work method You can set daily tomato clock goals, rest time, and select the tasks to focus on from the to-do list Progress Management Quantify your goals, support goal grouping and progress notes, with a simple and beautiful progress bar, clearly track your goal progress. Flash Notes Integrate custom tags, support full-text search and display by tags. In our daily life, there will always be a moment of light and whimsy, it can be the emotion after reading a text, it can be the resonance of listening to a song, or simply want to record the moment's thoughts. If you are like me and want to practice writing long articles, then you can start by writing a paragraph every day and gradually improve your writing skills day by day. ----------------- Subscription Instructions --Subscription period: 1 month, 1 year (non-automatic renewal, please feel free to purchase) -- Payment: Payment will be deducted through the user's iTunes account, and payment will be made once the user confirms the purchase. --User Terms: http://freelancer-x.com/app-terms/ -- Privacy Policy: http://freelancer-x.com/app-privacy-policy/

Application Screenshot

Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$6.99 ‚Üí $1.99 [$1.99 ~ $6.99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö$1.99

Application Description

Machinarium is the award-winning independent adventure game developed by the makers of Samorost series, Botanicula and CHUCHEL. Help Josef the robot to save his girlfriend Berta kidnapped by the Black Cap Brotherhood gang. "Absolutely Fantastic" - TouchArcade 4/4 - USA TODAY 4/4 - SlideToPlay 9/10 - Pocket Gamer Awards: - IGF, Excellence in Visual Art Award - Gamasutra, Best Indie Game Of The Year - VGChartz.com, Best Indie Game Of The Year

entry.title: Subnautica
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$9.99 ‚Üí $6.99 [$6.99 ~ $9.99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö$6.99

Application Description

*Make sure to check if your device is supported before playing Subnautica!* Subnautica is an underwater adventure game set on an alien ocean planet. A massive, open world full of wonder and peril awaits you! Descend into the depths, craft equipment, pilot submarines and out-smart wildlife to explore lush coral reefs, volcanoes, cave systems, and more - all while trying to survive. Unravel the mystery of this world teeming with creatures, both friendly and hostile, scattered with clues from a previous time. Play in Survival mode to experience the original challenge, or switch to Freedom or Creative mode to discover this oceanic planet without the pressures of thirst, hunger, or oxygen. FEATURES ‚Ä¢ SURVIVE - After crash landing on a vast underwater planet, the clock is ticking to find water, food, and to develop the equipment you need to explore. ‚Ä¢ EXPLORE - Manage your hunger, thirst, and oxygen supply as you dive into towering kelp forests, sunlit plateaus, bio-luminescent reefs, and winding cave systems. ‚Ä¢ SCAVENGE - Collect resources from the ocean around you. Venture deeper and further to find rarer resources, allowing you to craft more advanced items. ‚Ä¢ CRAFT - Build bases to shelter in, vehicles to pilot, tools for survival to aid you in navigating and adapting to this subaquatic landscape. ‚Ä¢ DISCOVER - What happened to this planet? What caused you to crash? Can you find a way to make it off the planet alive? ‚Ä¢ CUSTOMIZE - Play in Survival mode to experience the original challenge, or switch to Freedom or Creative mode to discover this oceanic planet without the pressures of thirst, hunger, or oxygen. CAREFULLY REDESIGNED FOR MOBILE ‚Ä¢ Revamped interface ‚Äì exclusive mobile UI with complete touch control ‚Ä¢ Game Center achievements ‚Ä¢ Cloud Save ‚Äì Share your progress between iOS devices ‚Ä¢ Compatible with MFi controllers ‚Ä¢ iPhone 16 Optimization (including Pro Max) ----- *DEVICES NOT SUPPORTED (THE GAME WON'T WORK)*: - iPhone Xr, iPhone SE Gen 2 (2020) - iPad Mini Gen 5, iPad Air Gen 3, iPad Gen 8, iPad Gen 9 *SUPPORTED DEVICES ON LOW RESOLUTION ONLY*: - iPhone Xs, iPhone Xs Max, iPhone 11, iPhone 11 Pro, iPhone 11 Pro Max, iPhone 12, iPhone 12 Mini, iPhone 13, iPhone 13 Mini, iPhone SE Gen 3 (2022) - iPad Pro 10.5", iPad Mini Gen 6, iPad Air Gen 4, iPad Gen 10, iPad Pro 11" Gen 1, iPad Pro 12.9" Gen 3 *SUPPORTED DEVICES* : - iPhone 12 Pro, iPhone 12 Pro Max, iPhone 13 Pro, iPhone 13 Pro Max, iPhone 14 AND ABOVE - iPad Pro 11" Gen 2, iPad Pro 12.9" Gen 4, iPad Air Gen 5, iPad Pro 11" Gen 3, iPad Pro 11" Gen 4, iPad Pro 12.9" Gen 5, iPad Pro 12.9" Gen 6 AND ABOVE

entry.title: DEATH STRANDING DIRECTOR'S CUT
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$39.99 ‚Üí $19.99 [$19.99 ~ $39.99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö$19.99

Application Description

From legendary game creator Hideo Kojima comes a genre-defying experience, now expanded in this definitive DIRECTOR‚ÄôS CUT. In the future, a mysterious event known as the Death Stranding has opened a doorway between the living and the dead, leading to grotesque creatures from the afterlife roaming the fallen world marred by a desolate society. As Sam Bridges, your mission is to deliver hope to humanity by connecting the last survivors of a decimated America. Can you reunite the shattered world, one step at a time? DEATH STRANDING DIRECTOR'S CUT on iOS includes a HIGH FRAME RATE, PHOTO MODE, and cross-over content from Valve Corporation's HALF-LIFE series and CD Projekt Red's Cyberpunk 2077. Stay connected with players around the globe with the Social Strand System‚Ñ¢. Mac and iOS ‚Ä¢ Sign-in to iCloud and activation of iCloudDrive are required to play this product. ‚Ä¢ This product can be played offline, but a network connection is required to fully experience the Social Strand System‚Ñ¢. Communication fees will be incurred during online play. Only for iOS version ‚Ä¢ When playing this product for the first time, you will be required to download additional data. You can start the game once you have downloaded approximately 13 GB, but additional downloads will occur as the game progresses, requiring a total of approximately 50 GB of downloads. Additional downloads will occur when additional language voice data is used. FAQs https://505.games/DSDCAppStoreFAQ

  • MonthlyÔºö$0.99

Application Description

MoneyTrack - Smart Personal Finance Tracker Record every dollar, take control of your finances. A clutter-free budgeting app with zero ads, zero splash screens, and zero financial product promotions. ‚ñ† KEY FEATURES ‚Ä¢ Auto-Tracking: Seamlessly integrates with Shortcuts for automatic expense capture triggered by your transactions ‚Ä¢ Versatile Entries: Track income, expenses, reimbursements, transfers, credit card payments, installments, and debt management ‚Ä¢ Powerful Analytics: Visualize spending patterns through pie charts, bar graphs and trend lines to quickly spot financial issues ‚Ä¢ Smart Budgeting: Create annual/monthly budgets for total spending and categories with dynamic daily allowance adjustments ‚ñ† COMPREHENSIVE ASSET MANAGEMENT ‚Ä¢ Unified dashboard for all account types (cash, checking accounts, credit cards, store cards) ‚Ä¢ Balance sheet and net worth tracking for real-time financial status monitoring ‚Ä¢ Credit card management system (payment alerts, limit tracking, grace period calculation) ‚Ä¢ Multi-currency support with exchange rates for all major world currencies ‚ñ† SMART FEATURES ‚Ä¢ Multiple Books: Easily separate personal, business, and project finances ‚Ä¢ Collaborative Tracking: Invite family members to create transparent household finances ‚Ä¢ Cloud Sync: Free data backup across devices with secure protection ‚Ä¢ Easy Import/Export: Support for importing from banking apps and exporting to Excel ‚Ä¢ Recurring Transactions: Set up automatic entries that generate on schedule ‚Ä¢ Payment Plans: Track installment payments with due date reminders ‚Ä¢ Custom Categories: Create unlimited category levels to match your financial organization ‚ñ† MULTI-DEVICE EXPERIENCE Sync between iPhone, iPad and PC with instant updates, keeping your financial picture complete no matter where you are. ‚ñ† FOCUSED ON FINANCIAL WELLNESS We're dedicated to one mission ‚Äî helping you achieve financial clarity. No investment pitches, no social distractions, just a clean and effective expense tracking experience.

entry.title: LP Helper Pro
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$9.99 ‚Üí $6.99 [$6.99 ~ $9.99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö$6.99

Application Description

"LP Helper Pro" is a permanent professional version of the "LP Helper" App. If you buy this version, you can use all professional functions permanently. "LP Helper Pro" includes four modules: map, on-site 3D compass, on-site AR and detailed information. Map - You can choose any position on the map and calculate the direction of the sun, moon, and the Milky Way at that location. You can also find a suitable location for shooting the starry sky through the light pollution map. In addition, we have added a new weather query function on the map. Now you can query the highly localized weather data of any location within 10 days, including weather, temperature, wind direction, wind speed, humidity, visual distance, cloud coverage and other information, accurate to every hour. 3D compass - calculate the direction of the sun, moon and galaxy at the specified location in the form of a 3D compass. Local AR--Use AR to intuitively estimate the position of the sun, moon and galaxy. This function is very practical to predict the composition in advance at the shooting site. On the AR interface, you can also simulate the star track under the specified exposure time. In this way, you can estimate the shooting time required in advance when taking star track photos. Detailed information -- lists various special moments of the day in the current location, as well as the function of the star calendar. In addition, you can also save the selected locations on the map and add various special moments to the calendar for automatic reminders. The time scroll bar at the bottom can switch between multi-clock modes to switch different time spans and help you select time more accurately. In addition, the App also integrates a variety of practical tools, such as depth-of-view calculator, star point calculator, star orbit calculator, and light brush. Privacy Statement: https://blog.csdn.net/syx151/article/details/143922426? Spm=1001.2014.3001.5501 License Agreement: https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/

entry.content:

All Price Information

  • All archetypesÔºö$1.99

  • ShamanismÔºö$0.99
  • TotalitarianÔºö$0.99

Application Description

You are reading this text. But why? Are you looking for a game, or has the game found you? Religion Inc. is more than just a strategy game. It is a simulation of creating a new reality. Will you shape faith, or will faith shape you? Humanity has always sought light in the darkness. It has always longed to believe in something greater, something that gives meaning to existence. That‚Äôs how religions were born ‚Äì as beacons in the storms of history, as compasses in the ocean of life. What if you become the creator of a religion? What if you could build your own faith, your own truth, your own reality? You are the Creator. You are the source. You are the inspiration. And if you are reading this text ‚Äì you‚Äôre already in the game! All that‚Äôs left is to install ‚Äì and enjoy the process, the simulation of creating religions! Become the source of faith ‚Äì in the strategy simulator Religion Inc. Humanity has always felt the need to believe in something greater than itself. Throughout history, people have searched for a light that could guide them through the darkness of the ages. For millions, that light became faith. Religion became a beacon, helping many find meaning in this world, weather the storms of change, and discover a path to happiness. There are many religions in the world, each shaped by its time and its challenges. But how else could this process have developed? What other fascinating and diverse forms could human beliefs have taken? The answers await you in our new game! Create your own unique religion, test its strength through the trials of time, and see if it can lead humanity to unity. Game Features *A variety of religious archetypes with unique cultural values and traditions! *Unlock all archetypes through gameplay: monotheism, spiritualism, pantheon, shamanism, paganism, and many more! *Will your followers become devoted fanatics or achieve higher enlightenment? The choice is yours! *Hundreds of real-world religious aspects ‚Äì and even more to come! Learn more about world religions! *Unique active abilities for each archetype ‚Äì perform miracles and change the world! *Relaxing gameplay, perfect for an evening break: collect faith points with simple clicks and explore various religious aspects. Play at your own pace and enjoy! Create your own unique religion by combining different religious aspects in the strategic simulator ‚Äì Religion Inc. Peace and love to all, brothers and sisters!
